author: Anonymous Gear
title: check-expect for problem 3?
question:
Here's part of the code given in the starter:
(@htdf short-dur-reachable)
(@signature Treasure Number -> (listof String))
;; produce labels of all treasures reachable by following routes < n hr long
for this check-expect
(check-expect (short-dur-reachable TA 9) (list "A" "C" "G" "D"))

; constants given below
(make-treasure "D" 21 1 "sunken"  (list (make-route 8 "G")
                                        (make-route 13 "H")
                                        (make-route 9 "I")
                                        (make-route 11 "A")))
(make-treasure "G" 52 3 "buried"  (list (make-route 2 "D")))
(make-treasure "C" 41 4 "buried"  (list (make-route 6 "G")))
(make-treasure "A" 7 1 "locked"   (list (make-route 12 "B")
                                        (make-route 7 "C")
                                        (make-route 27 "D")))
Why are "G" and "D" included in the list?
student_answer: The problem statement says "following routes less than n hours long". This does not mean that the entire route has to be less than n hours long, just that each individual route between treasures needs to be less than n hours long.
